vidis.data.sim
Interface IComponent

All Superinterfaces:
IVariableChangeProducer, IVariableContainer
All Known Implementing Classes:
AComponent, SimLink, SimNode, SimPacket
public interface IComponent
extends IVariableContainer

this is the basic interface for all components that may be executable by the simulator

Author:
dominik

Method Summary
 void execute()
          a default component of the simulator implements this function so that the simulator can execute it
 void kill()
          cause this component to destroy itself and all of its component/child classes

getVariableById, getVariableIds, hasVariable, registerVariable
